A pen of 29 sheep was observed to have a faulty automatic waterer during the inspection, and when the waterer was
adjusted for appropriate water flow , the sheep in the pen were observed pushing to drink in turns for over 20 minutes.
Failure to provide adequate water supply can lead to distress and poor welfare. The facility must ensure that adequate
water is provided as often as necessary to ensure animal welfare.
Corrected during the inspection on 06 January 2025.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representatives.
